text: Yis Puvatɨzir Bretɨn Isam Damuamin Dughiabar faragha zuir dughiam, Judan gumaziba me arazir kam iti. Me faragh God Israelbagh Itazir Dughiam gɨnɨghnɨghɨva sipsipɨn igiam inigh God danighɨva an ofa damuam. Ezɨ Iesusɨn suren gumaziba an azara, “Nɨ danganir manamɨn, e mangɨ, nɨ God Israelbagh Itazir Dughiamɨn isam ramɨsɨ, e bizibar akɨram?”
